description.brief: SSC32py controls servos attached to a SSC-32 controller

package.description:
SSC32py provides a library to interact with the SSC32 controller by Lynxmotion.
It is based strongly on the Robotis library by Healthcare Robotics Lab at Georgia Tech, and provides a full server that will listen to angle commands and publish the current state of servos attached to the SSC-32
package.author: Mark Kalmes
